thread.title: wears unusual eye makeup at Tommy Hilfiger show
thread.title_full: Lady Gaga wears unusual eye makeup at Tommy Hilfiger show | Daily Mail Online

author: Rebecca Davison
title: wears unusual eye makeup at Tommy Hilfiger show
text:
Lady Gaga looked incredible as she sat in the audience of the Tommy Hilfiger Tommyland runway show in LA's Venice Beach on Wednesday.
The 30-year-old sported quirky eye embellishments and showed off her incredible legs as she modelled a gorgeous sequined top and matching hotpants and fishnet tights.
The outing comes after she hit back at body shamers following her highly-acclaimed halftime performance at the Super Bowl on Sunday.
Scroll down for video
Not hard to miss: Lady Gaga sported embellished eyes and showed off her incredible legs Tommy Hilfiger Tommyland runway show in LA's Venice Beach on Wednesday
Well-heeled: The 30-year-old showed off her slim tummy and perfect pins after the show after hitting back at body shamers who criticised her 'pot belly'
Go glam like Lady Gaga in an embellished top by Tommy Hilfiger Tommy Hilfiger AW16
Shop the new collection here...
Buy now
Fresh from her jaw-dropping halftime performance at the Superbowl on Sunday, Lady Gaga was a front row guest at yesterday's Tommy Hilfiger SS17 presentation.
Of course, she doesn't like to do things by halves when it comes to style. So this sequin embellished gold top and shorts ensemble is actually realtively tame for the superstar singer! Throw in some fishnet tights, statement eye make-up and embroidered boots and it's just another day in Gaga's world.
We love the rope and ship embroidery on this top, which is a nice nod to the brand's signature nautical vibe. The puff sleeves and boxy shape are super flattering, plus you can never go too far wrong with sequins!
We spotted a dress in the same design on the AW16 runway, but sadly it's not available to buy online. So instead, click (right) to shop the hot off the catwalk collection, or recreate the look with the help of our edit below.

The beauty wore unusual eye makeup.
Her ensemble stood out in the crowd because it was a cream satin sequined top with hot pants and black fishnet stockings with lace-up boots.
The star seemed to know Yolanda Foster well as she gave the RHOBH star a hug during the show.
''I heard my body is a topic of conversation': Lady Gaga had a message Tuesday for body shamers who criticized her 'pot belly' that was visible during her Super Bowl halftime show
Cruel: Some trolls were quick to criticize the singer as she took the stage in a crop top and short shorts to perform a 13-minite medley of her hits at the NRG Stadium in Houston
Foster's daughter Gigi Hadid as well as little sister Bella were walking the show.
Gaga looked stoned faced as she looked at the leggy models make their way down the runway.
She arrived with a pretty brunette woman in a green top and held onto red roses.
Gaga's 'pot belly' was mocked on social media following her Super Bowl 51 halftime performance in a crop top and sorts.
There's Bella: Gaga looked closely at the outfit worn by Bella Hadid
Not just liner and mascara: The beauty wore unusual eye makeup that included black embellished paint as she clutched a bunch of roses
The brows have a future: The siren looked picture perfect as she posed in the FROW
Praise to the queen! On Wednesday Tommy Hilfiger proved he might be one of her innumerable minions as he paid tribute to Mother Monster Lady Gaga
Come here Tommy! The pop star then graced her host with a kiss
No opening act! The reverent moment appeared to take place midway through the show with photographers and attendees cheering on the performance onstage
On Tuesday, Lady Gaga hit back at the body shamers posting a photo of herself and her dancers and writing: 'I heard my body is a topic of conversation so I wanted to say, I'm proud of my body and you should be proud of yours too. No matter who you are or what you do.'
She continued in her Instagram post: ' I could give you a million reasons why you don't need to cater to anyone or anything to succeed. Be you, and be relentlessly you. That's the stuff of champions.'
The singer concluded her message: 'Thank you so much everyone for supporting me. I love you guys. Xoxo, gaga.'
Two close: The star seemed to know Yolanda Foster well as she gave the RHOBH star a hug during the show
Cool outfit: Her ensemble stood out in the crowd because it was a cream satin sequined top with hot pants and black fishnet stockings with lace-up boots
Stunning: Lady Gaga showed off her incredible figure in fishnets and boots
Earlier the Joanne singer was spotted getting out of a black car as she made her way to the event.
Tommyland was held just steps from the beach in the Venice Beach area.
He had games and events set up for the guests. There was also rumoured to be a performance by Fergie.

She continued in her Instagram post: 'I could give you a million reasons why you don't need to cater to anyone or anything to succeed. Be you, and be relentlessly you. That's the stuff of champions.'
The singer, 30, concluded her message: 'Thank you so much everyone for supporting me. I love you guys. Xoxo, gaga.'

Busy bee: Earlier Wednesday, she announced a new video. 'I’M STRUNG OUT ON #JOHNWAYNE! Surprise! Next #JOANNE music video out now exclusively on @AppleMusic #GagaJohnWayne,' she wrote on social media
More than 117 million people tuned in to watch Gaga perform Sunday in Houston and most were mesmerized by her 13-minute solo set in which she rattled through a medley of her hits.
Earlier Wednesday, she announced a new video.
'I’M STRUNG OUT ON #JOHNWAYNE! Surprise! Next #JOANNE music video out now exclusively on @AppleMusic #GagaJohnWayne,' she wrote on social media.
Got it going on: She later covered up in a hoodie as she looked chic and unique
See you later: Gaga wrapped a hoodie around her waist as she climbed into her posh ride home at the end of the night
